response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe has immense value and could significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an introductory price of $14,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential to maximize the product's full potential and contribute to its success in your specific context. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your operations with this remarkable solution.", "product_price": 14500}
